EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #23.2019 Dealer Update #23
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - December 13, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | December 2019 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins, with more coming in the next few weeks:
- 2020-05 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-05%20Rev A_FANS 1A PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft Mk II Plus.pdf]]>_FANS 1A PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft Mk II Plus - 2020-06 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-06%20Rev A_PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft Mk III to Mk II Plus.pdf]]>_PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft Mk III to Mk II Plus - 2020-10 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-10 Rev -_FMS 6.1 Upgrade for Business Aircraft Equipped with NZ-20....pdf]]> FMS 6.1 Upgrade for Business Aircraft Equipped with NZ-2000 FMS - 2020-11 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-11 Rev -_FMS 6.1 with LPV Upgrade for the Falcon 900C and 900EX.pdf]]> FMS 6.1 with LPV Upgrade for the Falcon 900C and 900EX - 2020-19 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-19 DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms.pdf]]> DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms - 2020-20 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-20 CMA 6800 LCD Display Unit Upgrade.pdf]]> CMA 6800 LCD Display Unit Upgrade - 2020-21 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-21 DU-1310 Display Replacement.pdf]]> DU-1310 Display Replacement - 2020-22 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-22-OEM Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> OEM Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft
- 2020-23 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-23 Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2020-24 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-24 Satcom High Data Rate for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Satcom High Data Rate for Business Aircraft - 2020-25 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-25 JetWave Satellite Communications System for Business Aviation.pdf]]> JetWave Satellite Communications System for Business Aviation - 2020-26 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-26 Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2020-27 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-27 Rev 0 Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for F900 and F2000 Aircraft.pdf]]> Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for F900 and F2000 Aircraft - 2020-28 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-28 Rev 0 Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for Global Express Aircraft.pdf]]> Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System MHT to OST Upgrade for Global Express Aircraft - 2020-29 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-29 Ovation Select CMS Upgrade for EMB I600.pdf]]> Ovation Select CMS Upgrade for EMB I600 - 2020-30 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-30 Ovation Select CMS Upgrade for Boeing Business Jet and VVIP Aircraft.pdf]]> Ovation Select CMS Upgrade for Boeing Business Jet and VVIP Aircraft - 2020-31 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-31 Ovation Select CMS Upgrade for Falcon F900 and F2000.pdf]]> Ovation Select CMS Upgrade for Falcon F900 and F2000 - 2020-32 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-32 Ovation Select CMS Upgrade for Global Express.pdf]]> Ovation Select CMS Upgrade for Global Express
Dealers can find 2019 and 2020 sales bulletins on our website under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
